import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'; import $ from "jquery"; export const SellMyProdect = () => { $(document).ready( function() { $(document).on('change', '.btn-file :file', function() { var input = $(this), label = input.val().replace(/\\/g, '/').replace(/.*\//, ''); input.trigger('fileselect', [label]); }); $('.btn-file :file').on('fileselect', function(event, label) { var input = $(this).parents('.input-group').find(':text'), log = label; if( input.length ) { input.val(log); } else { if( log ) alert(log); } }); function readURL(input) { if (input.files && input.files[0]) { var reader = new FileReader(); reader.onload = function (e) { $('#img-upload').attr('src', e.target.result); } reader.readAsDataURL(input.files[0]); } } $("#imgInp").change(function(){ readURL(this); }); }); return ( <>
Buy & Sell > Create Ad Profile
Ad Details
Create Your Post
) } export default SellMyProdect;
